He's a member of one of UIMCEC branches, and he is seeking a loan of XOF 300'000 to buy products to resell. His goal is to bolster his working capital and meet customer demand.

Thanks to the expected increase of his profits, he would like to improve the social standard of living of his family.

loans.use: to buy CDs, tapes, and accessories for mobile phones

loans.name: Otgondorj

texts.en:
Otgondorj is a 42-year-old man who lives with his wife and three daughters in Tosontsengel Soum of Zavhan province. His wife is an entrepreneur; two of their girls study at secondary school and the youngest one goes to kindergarten.  He has been baking bread and selling it in the local area since 2004. He needs a specific amount of money to supply different types of bakery goods using his equipment.  

He is a nice man who says, "I want to increase the number of my product types so that the sales increase.'  He and his wife plan to have their daughter study abroad. The total amount he is requesting is 500,000 MNT for materials for the bakery.

loans.use: To purchase materials for the bakery.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a 38-year-old married woman with seven children who are enrolled in school. Her husband Juma is a farmer who contributes to the provision of family basic needs. She owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for her family.

Mwanamisi has operated a food stall for the past 10 years; her potential clients are the local area villagers. She faces a major challenge of fluctuating prices of commodities in the market. She dreams of establishing a café in the future.

With the Kshs 10,000 she wants to purchase 7 kilos of beans, 10 kilos of rice, 5 kilos of sugar, 2 kilos of tea leaves and 5 liters of cooking oil for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access funds to uplift her living standards and expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase 7 kilos of beans, 10 kilos of rice, 5 kilos of sugar, 2 kilos of tea leaves and 5 liters of cooking oil for her business.

loans.name: Serah

texts.en:
Serah has been in the clothing sales business in Nakuru town for the last six years.  She is 28 years old, married to Joseph, and they have two children.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our existing clients and this will be her first loan.  She plans to use the loan amount to buy more stock of school uniforms and baby outfits for sale in her business.

In future, Serah hopes to expand her business and open a big mall and sell clothes and clothing materials wholesale, thereby becoming one of the best clothing dealers in Nakuru town.

loans.use: To add more stock of clothes.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 45-year-old married man, father of seven children. Twenty-one years ago, Ahmad started working in construction, specializing in all cement and paint work. Ahmad is a hard worker, he has a very good reputation in his area. 

Ahmad has been an Al Majmoua, Kiva partner, borrower for two cycles; his previous loan was invested in making necessary healthy changes in his house, and buying necessary products for a project he had to accomplish, and it came with a very impressive result.

Today's loan will be invested in buying necessary tools for his business. 

Ahmad will also help his daughter with her wedding preparations as much as he can. He hopes he can afford  everything his children need in the future.

loans.use: To buy necessary tools for his business

loans.name: Seynabou

texts.fr: Madame Seynabou  est âgée  de 52 ans. Elle vit dans une des communautés villageoises du territoire sénégalais. Elle est mariée et mère de 7 enfants dont l’âge  varie entre 17 et 35 ans. Elle est vendeuse de poissons depuis plus de 10 ans dans un marché proche de sa zone d’habitation. Elle a choisi son activité par passion et surtout  par nécessité dans le souci de soutenir financièrement sa famille. C’est le bénéfice qui l’intéresse  le plus. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCECF depuis aout 2010.elle sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de poissons a revendre. Son objectif est de renforcer et mieux développer son  activité. Avec l’augmentation de ses bénéfices elle souhaite améliorer les conditions de vie sociale de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Seynabou, age 52, lives in one of Senegal's village communities. She's married and the mother of seven children, whose ages range from 17 to 35.

For ten years, she's been selling fish in a market close to the neighborhood where she lives. She chose this business out of passion, and mainly out of necessity to financially support her family. She's mostly interested in the profits.

She's been a member of one of UIMCEC's branches since August 2010. She's seeking a loan of XOF 200'000, intended to buy fish to resell.

Her goal is to bolster and better develop her business. Thanks to the increase of her profits, she would like to improve her family's social standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fish to resell

loans.name: Carolyne

texts.en:
Carolyne  has been in farming in her hometown of Kitale, Western Kenya for 11 years. She produces maize and beans for the local market. She lives with her family of four children, aged between 15 and 2 years, in her hometown of Kitale and says farming is their source of livelihood.

Carolyne has requested a loan of 30,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy poultry birds for an expansion of her farming by venturing into poultry farming as well. She says poultry farming has become a lucrative business in the area due to availability of the market both for layers and broilers. She is looking forward to being able to meet her family basic needs with income generated from her poultry business.

She however puts emphasis on the challenges occasioned by animal diseases and more specifically for dairy and poultry farming.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds.

loans.name: Suhnorov

texts.en: Suhnorov is a 27-year-old man who lives with his wife and two daughters in Tosontsengel Soum. His wife makes traditional clothes and sells them. Their daughters go to the kindergarten. He has been running a clothing business in which he brings the products from Erlian, a neighboring city in China. He has already made permanent customers during these two years. He sells the goods, especially women's clothes, from a shop counter of the main market in the area. He is a really inovative guy who says, "I would like to run my business successfully with your help. I have further plans to extend my business and raise my family income."  The total amount he is requesting is 500,000 MNT to use to bring in goods from China.

loans.use: To purchase more goods from Erlian.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is a 44-year-old farmer, and she is married to Peter who is a businessman. They are blessed with one child who is  20 years old. She has been rearing poultry for the past three years with the monthly income of KES 10,000 which she uses to support her family.


She is applying for his first loan term from KADET LTD, after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Catherine will use the loan to buy chicken feed and more chicks to rear for sale. 

With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her child. Her hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and venture into mixed crop farming.

loans.use: To buy chicken feed and more chicks.

loans.name: Lira

texts.ru:
Лире 41 год, замужем, воспитывает четырех детей.  В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Лира занимается животноводством. С 1998 года, стартовав суммы в 23,000 сом (KGS),  Лира смогла развить хозяйство с ежемесячной прибылью около 16,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Лира обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двух бычков. Доходы Лира планирует вложить в покупку стройматериалов для постройки  большого удобного сарая для скота.
texts.en: Lira is 41 years old, married and is raising four children.  Lira is involved in animal husbandry, and this is the main source of income for her family.  Having started her business in 1998 with a sum of 23,000 som (KGS), she was able to develop her business to have a monthly profit of about 16,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her business, Lira requested a loan in the sum of 120,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to purchase two bulls.  She plans to invest the profits into purchasing construction materials to build a large and comfortable shed for livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Trabajadoras se denomina el excelente grupo de mujeres conformado en la ciudad de Itá, está integrado por 12 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto  en el 1° ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa.
Catalina es una de las miembros del grupo, ella nos comenta que se dedica a la venta de ropas usadas. Comenta que es un negocio bueno, pues la ropa usada es una alternativa para las personas de menos recursos. Su meta es poder tener una tienda grande donde poder ofrecer más prendas a sus clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de segunda mano, con lo cual podrá surtirse para brindar a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mujeres Trabajadoras is the name of the excellent group of women formed in the city of Itá.  It is made up of 12 women who currently are working together very comfortably and supportively in their first loan cycle. 

Catalina is one of the members of the group.  She tells us that she works selling used clothing.  She says it is a good business because used clothing is an alternative for people of fewer resources.  Her goal is to be able to have a big store where she will be able to offer more clothes to her customers.

She is requesting the loan to buy second-hand clothing with which she will be able to stock up, to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing for resale.

loans.name: Rahab

texts.en:
Rahab is 47 years old. She is married to Joseph, 51 years old, and together they have ten children. She is a farmer and has been in the business for the last eleven years.

This is her third loan with KADET LTD. She repaid her previous loans successfully. She will use the loan amount to purchase seedlings, fertilizer and pay her casual laborers

From her previous loan, she managed to purchase a piece of land from the anticipated profits received. In future she hopes to be a prominent farmer in the area.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer, and to pay her casual workers.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is 24 years old, married and a mother of one child. She runs an open air salon and has been in the business for the last one year, earning a monthly profit of KES 8,000. 

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer, and she is applying for her first loan of KES. 30,000 from KADET LTD, with which she intends to put up a wooden structure for her business. 

She will save the anticipated profit and help pay school fees for her child. In future, Lilian hopes to grow her salon and turn it into a full beauty shop.

loans.use: to put up a wooden structure for her business.

loans.name: Blue Group

texts.en:
Zakia, is in her late forties and is divorced and has two children. She has been a food vendor for ten years now. She works from 6am to 9pm and she is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Zakia’s 9th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.   She used the previous loan to increase the  stock of food and has paid back her loan successfully. She hopes for a loan to add more stock of food.  Zakia’s dream is to one day send her children to better schools.

Zakia will share this loan with her loan group, "Blue", which totals 16 members.  The members of the group will hold each other accountable in paying back the loan.

loans.use: to add more stock of food.

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.en:
Jacinto is a 37-year-old married man from Trinidad, Bohol. He has no children yet.

Jacinto works as a farmer. He tills his own land and also hires some workers to help him till his land. Jacinto grows rice crops and sells his harvest to rice traders in his town. He works hard to keep his crops healthy and his farm free of weeds and pests.

Jacinto has requested this loan to purchase fertilizer and seeds and to pay for labor. Jacinto hopes that in the future he will have a progressive life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds and to pay for labor

loans.name: Sofia

texts.en:
Sofia is a 34-year-old divorced woman with 5 children, 4 of whom are enrolled in school. She owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for her family and school fees for her children.

Sofia has operated a fish selling business for the past 8 years; her potential clients are the local area villagers. She faces a major challenge of competition from other operators. She dreams of establishing a sea food retail shop in the future.

With the Kshs 10,000 she wants to purchase 20 kilos of fish and 15 liters of cooking oil for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access funds to uplift her living standards and expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase 20 kilos of fish and 15 liters of cooking oil for her business.

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en:
Andrew is a 65 year-old businessman who is married to Mary, who is a farmer. They are blessed with 9 children, seven adults and two dependents. He has been selling scrap metals for the past year, with a monthly income of KES 5,000, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his second loan term from KADET LTD., after repaying the previous loan successfully. Andrew will use the loan to buy more metals for his business.

With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to open a retail shop for his wife.

loans.use: To buy more metals for his business

loans.name: Soatmoh

texts.ru: Соатмох 43 летняя женщина, замужем, мать четверых детей.Она мастер своего дела,портниха национальных женских платьев. Раньше она шила на дому, а теперь у неё цех, который она арендует и вместе с учениками шьёт заказы. Но у нее вышивальной машинки для вышивания нарядных платьев, для чего она решила получить кредит.Её муж на заработках в России, сын учится в Университете, дочери учатся в средних школах города. Она благодарна организации за предоставленную ей возможность купить в кредит машинку.
texts.en: Soatmoh is a 43 year-old woman, who is married and is a mother of four children.  She is a master of her craft - a seamstress of women's dresses.  She previously sewed at home and now leases work space, where she and her apprentices sew to-order.  However, Soatmoh does not have an embroidery machine for making festive dresses; thus, she decided to obtain a loan.  Her husband works in Russia, son attends a university, and daughters go to the city's secondary schools.  Soatmoh is grateful to the organization for the provided opportunity to purchase an embroidery machine with this loan.

loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine

loans.name: Zarrina

texts.ru: Заррина занимается торговлей тканей. Этим видом деятельности она занимается четыре года. Ей 29 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Она берет кредит для покупки разноцветных тканей с целью увеличения ассортимента товара.
texts.en: Zarrina is involved in selling fabrics.  She has been in this business for four years.  She is 29 years old, married and has two children.  Zarrina is requesting this loan to purchase colorful fabrics in order to increase her goods turnover.

loans.use: to purchase colorful fabrics

loans.name: Nurali

texts.ru: Нурали житель города Истаравшан. Ему 41 год. У него четверо детей. Его жена занимается животноводством. Сам он занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 14 лет. Кредит берет для посева картошки, лука и кукурузы.
texts.en: Nurali is a resident of the city of Istaravshan.  He is 41 years old and has four children.  His wife is involved in animal husbandry.  Nurali is involved in growing agricultural crops.  He has been in this business for 14 years.  He is requesting this loan to sow potatoes, onions and corn.

loans.use: to sow potatoes, onions and corn

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. Cirilo; el socio altera sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales como cerdos,el socio cria a estos animales para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan como restaurantes y a la vez venderlos en la feria de los dias viernes,el socio es una persona bien alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a sus familia.  
 
El socio solicita el prestamo para la compra de alimentos para sus animales(chanchos) como forraje.
texts.en:
Cirilo has changed his daily activities to include the business of raising animals like pigs. He raises these animals to later sell them to the customers that ask for them, like restaurants, and at the same time to sell them to the market on Fridays. He is quite a happy and responsible person with the strong desire to get ahead for his family. This will be the way he helps his family move forward. 

Cirilo is asking for the loan for the purchase of food for his animals (pigs), like fodder.

loans.use: to purchase food, like fodder, for his animals (pigs.)

loans.name: Virgencita De Guadalupe Group

texts.es:
El Señora DINA LIZ 18 años de edad estado civil casada, con 01 hija menor de edad. Es socio de la  alcancía comunal “Virgencita de Guadalupe”.
Ella actualmente tiene su automóvil que alquila todos los días, a la vez se dedica a la venta de bebidas calientes como cafés, calientes, te, etc. El préstamo solicito para el mantenimiento de su automóvil en la compra de repuestos y otros. Dando la  oportunidad para mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
Desea en el futuro comprar su casa. En la fotografía está ubicado la primera persona lado izquierda que viste con pantalón, color azul, polo color blanco, casaca color marrón se encuentra sentada en el sofá.
texts.en:
Dina Liz, 18, is in a common-law marriage and has a young daughter.  She is a member of the communal bank “Virgencita de Guadalupe."  She now has an automobile that she rents every day, and she also has a business selling hot drinks such as coffee and tea.  She will use this loan to do maintenance work on her automobile, and to buy some parts for it.  This will give her the opportunity to increase her earnings.

In the future, Dina Liz wants to buy her house.  In the photograph, she is the first person seated on the sofa that you see on the left, who is wearing blue pants, a white shirt, and a brown jacket.

loans.use: to buy automobile parts and other items

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
La socia sigue trabajando en su carrera de contabilidad y ahora tambien se esta dedicando al negocio de venta de huevos,la socia distribuye huevos al por mayor a las diferentes tiendas de abarrotes,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los buevos.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar huevos al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues working in the accountancy field.  She is also now working in the egg sales business.  She distributes eggs wholesale to different grocery stores.  Through this business, she provides for her children.  The member's dream is to own sales premises from which she can sell her eggs.  She is requesting this loan to buy eggs wholesale.

The member is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy eggs wholesale

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. Paulino, el socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicandose agricultura y ganaderia el cuenta con vacas y chanchos ,el socio trabaja conjuntamente con su esposa,el socio cria a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan y a la vez venderlos en las ferias de los dias viernes ,el socio es una persona bien alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar adelante,a la vez el socio tambien se dedica a la agricultura sembrando papa y maiz para tambien venderlo en ferias y clientes que le solicitan,el socio es una persona bien alegre y responsable.

 El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar una vaca lechera.
texts.en:
Paulino is a member who spends his days farming and raising livestock.  He owns cows and pigs, and works together with his wife.  He raises his animals and then sells them to customers who request them.  He also sometimes sells them at Friday markets.  The member is a very cheerful and responsible person who has a great desire to do well in life.  He also grows potatoes and corn which he sells in the markets and to customers who request them.

The member is requesting this loan to buy a dairy cow.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Ivan Marcelino

texts.es: El socio desea ene sta ocasión hacerle el mantenimiento a su unidad vehicular para ello el socio desea invertir el credito en la compra de engrase y llevar al taller para que le hagan el mantenimiento respectivo a sus vehiculo. El socio desea seguir prosperando para comprar otro vehiculo y poder darlo en alquiler para que siga generando ingresos economicos.
texts.en: At this time, Ivan Marcelino wants to do some maintenance work on his vehicle.  He wants to use this loan to purchase grease and take his vehicle to the repair shop so that he can have maintenance work done on it.  He wants to continue to prosper and buy another vehicle to rent out, so that it will generate more income for him.

loans.use: to invest in maintenance work on his taxi

loans.name: Maftuna

texts.ru: Мафтуна родилась в 1990 году в семье служащего. В 1997 году поступила в школу № 95 и в 2008 году успешно закончила. Затем в этом же году поступила в Технический Университет Таджикистана и в настоящее время является студенткой 4-го курса. Она активная, целеустремленная, участвует на всех молодежных студенческих мероприятиях. Среди студентов имеет хороший авторитет. Мафтуна запрашивает займ в размере 600$ США для оплаты годового обучения. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Maftuna was born in 1990 into a military family.  She started school number 95 in 1997 and successfully graduated in 2008.  Then, she was accepted to the Tajikistan Technical University that same year and is currently a fourth-year student there.  She is active, goal-oriented, and participates in all youth, student events.  She has a good reputation among other students.  Maftuna is requesting a loan in the sum of $600 to pay for her annual tuition.  She relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to pay for education

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is a 30-year-old divorced woman with one child who is enrolled in school. She lives in a rental house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees for her child.

Mwanasiti has operated a café for the past year; her potential clients are the local area villagers. She faces a major challenge of fluctuating prices of commodities in the market. She dreams of establishing a restaurant in the future.

With the 5,000 KES loan, she wants to purchase more beans, rice, sugar, tea leaves, and cooking oil for her café. She decided to join Yehu to access funds to uplift her living standards and expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more beans, rice, sugar, tea leaves, and cooking oil for her café.

loans.name: Donata

texts.es:
Donata es socia del Banco Comunal Paloma, se dedica a la venta de comida, y ahora poco inauguro una tienda de fertilizantes, abonos y remedios para los sembríos, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 10 años, ella recuerda que  con los préstamos recibidos se pudo comprar sus electrodomésticos.
Donata esta muy bien, porque los préstamos que recibe le dan estabilidad y tranquilidad que no le da nadie, con las capacitaciones de su Banco Comunal pudo aprender mucho sobre su negocio y familia.
el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de leña, arroz, azúcar y aceite.
texts.en:
Donata is a member of Paloma Communal Bank.  She works selling food, and a little while ago she opened a store for fertilizer, manure, and crop treatments.  She has been a member of Finca Perú for ten years.  She remembers that with the loans she received she was able to buy her electrical appliances.

Donata is very well because the loans she receives give her the stability and peace that nobody gives her.  She was able to learn a lot about her business and family from the trainings from her communal bank.

She will invest the loan she is requesting in buying firewood, rice, sugar, and oil.

loans.use: to buy firewood, rice, sugar, and oil.

loans.name: Bahodir

texts.ru: Баходир житель города Турсунзаде. Ему 34 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Баходир занимается торговлей у себя дома. Он продает порошки уничтожающие насекомых. Этим видом деятельности он занимается четыре года. Кредит берет для увеличения ассортимента товара.
texts.en: Bahodir lives in the city of Tursun-zoda. He's thirty-four years old, married and has three children. Bahodir sells anti-bug powders from his house. He's been involved in this business for over four years. He's asking for a loan in order to increase his product variety.

loans.use: to purchase bracelets, rubber bands and powders.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es:
Doña Ana Julia, sigue  con su negocio de alquiler de cuarto, y costura, el cual por varios años, ha venido realizando, madre soltera, de sus tres hijos dos estudian y la mayor trabaja.
Atraves de los financiamiento ha construido y mejorado sus cuartos de alquiler, hoy en dia son seis los que esta alquilando. Con este nuevo prestamo construira muro en la parte trasera, el cual queda contiguo al vecino, mejorando esta condicion, para reguardar su propiedad, y a su familia.  Materiales a comprar, piedra, arena, cemento, hierro, tablas, clavos entre otros productos
texts.en:
Ana Julia continues in her business of renting rooms and dressmaking, both of which she has been involved in for various years. She is a single mother with 3 children, 2 of whom are studying while the eldest is working.

Using previous loans, she has constructed or improved her rental rooms. Today there are 6 available for renting. With this new loan, she will construct a wall at the back of her house, bordering her neighbor's property. This will make her home and her family more secure. To do this, she will purchase materials such as stone, sand, cement, iron, boards and nails, among other products.

loans.use: buy construction materials to build a protective wall at  the back of her house.

loans.name: Soeng

texts.en:
In Kompong Cham province, Mrs. Soeng, age 44, has spent most of her life cultivating crops on the existing farmland. Her crops include rice, potatoes and vegetables. She particularly grows her crops based on the season and the market demand. She is married and has 4 children, one of whom lives independently with a new family.

She will use the loan of KHR1,000,000 to pay local laborers to plow on a few hectares of her farmland. Mrs. Soeng hopes to buy additional farmland to expand her business someday.

loans.use: to pay local laborers to plow on a few hectares of her farmland.

loans.name: Sajjad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 24 years old, single and lives with six family members, three of whom work.

Sajjad has been a tailor since 2006.  He professionally makes, repairs, or alters suits, coats and trousers for men. He has more than five years experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers and their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting $3000 to redecorate his workshop. He is aiming to gain more profits for the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: To redecorate his workshop.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de productos de belleza y tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de computadoras,ella vende lapiz labiales,perfumes,cremas y esmaltes,ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cosmeticos y tambien ampliar el negocio de venta de computadoras.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar lapiz labilaes,cremas y perfumes y tambien para comprar repuestos para computadoras.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ruth continues to make a living selling beauty products and also continues with the computer business. She sells lipstick, perfumes, creams, and polishes. She sells them by walking around from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Through this business she has helped her children get ahead. 

Her dream is to have a place where she can sell cosmetics and expand her computer-selling business. She is asking for the loan to buy lipstick, creams, and perfumes, and also to buy computer parts. 

Ruth is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy lipstick, creams, and perfumes, and also to buy computer parts.

loans.name: Azizbek

texts.ru: Азизбек проживает в городе Истаравшан. Возраст, 27 лет. Он женат. У него восемь детей. Азизбек предоставляет услугу, такси. В этой области он 7 лет. Он берет кредит для ремонта автомашины.
texts.en: Azizbek lives in the city of Istaravshan.  He is 27 years old, married and has eight children.  Azizbek provides a taxi service.  He has been in this business for seven years.  He is requesting this loan to repair his car.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Tolib

texts.ru: Толиб житель района Кубодиён. Ему 52 года. Он женат. У него 8 детей. Он уже год как занимается животноводством. Он в основном откармливает и продает скот. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Tolib is a resident of the Qubadiyon district.  He is 52 years old, married and has eight children.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for one year.  He primarily fattens up and sells livestock.  Tolib is requesting this loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Zohirjon

texts.ru: Зохирчон проживает в городе Истаравшан. Ему 33 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Зохирчон имеет торговую точку на рынке. Он продает музыкальные диски и DVD. В этой области он шесть лет. Зохирчон берет кредит для увеличения ассортимента.
texts.en: Zohirjon lives in the city of Istaravshan.  He is 33 years old, married and has two children.  Zohirjon has a retail outlet at a market.  He sells music discs and DVDs.  He has been in this business for six years.  Zohirjon is requesting this loan to expand merchandise selection.

loans.use: to expand merchandise selection

loans.name: Salim

texts.ru: Салим предоставляет услугу такси. Он развозит людей по маршруту Истаравшан - Душанбе. В этой области он имеет богатый опыт. Ему 34 года. Он женат. Кредит берет для ремонта автомашины, чтобы предоставить безопасную услугу.
texts.en: Salim provides a taxi service.  He transports people along the Istaravshan - Dushanbe route.  He has a rich experience in this field.  Salim is 34 years old, married.  He is requesting this loan to repair his car in order to provide a safe service.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
Marcelina de 43 años. Está casada con Félix con quien tiene 9 hijos, pero solo vive con 5 de ellos, por ser menores de edad, siendo el más pequeño de 3 años de edad. Esta numerosa familia vive en una casa propia en la comunidad de Zona Patria, provincia de Chanchamayo. Marcelina es una mujer emprendedora. Su principal actividad económica es la agricultura. Desde su juventud se dedica a esta cansada labor, pero se siente contenta por que todo lo que obtiene es fruto de su sudor y todo para educar a sus hijos.  En retribución de tanto cariño, ahora sus hijos la apoyan en las faenas del campo. Félix, su pareja también muestra disposición y ganas al momento de sembrar sus productos. Marcelina cuenta con 9 parcelas de terrenos de cultivos, pero solo produce 4 de toda esa extensión, obteniendo 30 sacos de café. 
Y como ella no se conforma con eso, instaló un negocio en su propia casa, ahí tiene fotocopiadoras, locutorios para realizar llamadas telefónicas, impresoras y una computadora. Así realiza servicios de impresiones, digitación y fotocopias de papeles y documentos. Está contenta con lo que hace.
Con su incansable labor educa a sus hijos y les otorga condiciones dignas de vida. No se puede quejar. Gracias a su ayuda, ella podría accederá su préstamo número 7 de MFP. Se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. A la vez menciona sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal, por que sus compañeros son solidarios y trabajadores.
Con el dinero del crédito comprará una pequeña fotocopiadora que cuesta entre 700 a 800 soles, con lo restante adquirirá bolsas de abonos orgánicos para sus cultivos de café.
texts.en:
Marcelina, 43, is married to Félix with whom she has nine children but only lives with five of them who are still minors; the youngest is three years old.  This large family lives in a house of their own located in the Zona Patria community, Chanchamayo Province.

Marcelina is an enterprising woman.  Her main economic activity is farming.  Since her youth she’s worked at this demanding occupation but she feels happy because everything she obtains is the fruit of her sweat and it’s all for her children’s education.  In restitution for so much affection, her children help her with the field work.  Félix, her spouse, also exhibits willingness and desire when the time to plant comes. Marcelina owns nine fields but only produces on four of them; she gets 30 sacks of coffee from that area.

Not satisfied with just that, she also installed a store at home.  She has photocopiers, telephone booths, printers and a computer there.  She thus provides printing, word processing and papers and documents photocopying.  She is happy with what she does.

Through her untiring work she educates her children and provides them with proper living conditions.  She can’t complain.  Thanks to your help she will access MFP loan #7.  She commits to be punctual with her monthly installments.  She also mentions that she feels very comfortable in her communal bank because her fellow members are supportive and hardworking.  She will use money from the loan to buy a small photocopier that costs between 700 and 800 soles and will use the rest to buy sacks of organic manure for her coffee crops.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier and sacks of organic manure.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es: Gladys, de 33 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy trabajadora. Convive con Carlos de 42 años con quien tiene tres hijos, y es por ellos que  trabaja mucho para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Gladys consiste en la compra y venta de artefactos, asimismo repara aquellos que sus clientes le llevan para que lo compongan. Todos los días, abre las puertas de su casa para empezar con su negocio. Su mercadería es adquirida por medio del reciclaje, ya que algunos van a su casa para donarlos y él los restaura para venderlos. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por más de 13 años y lo hace a lado de su pareja. Se siente muy bien con su trabajo ya que le permite tener buenos ingresos a parte de estar en su hogar y poder ver y atender a sus hijos como ella desea. Al principio cuando se inició solo reparaba, con el pasar del tiempo los clientes dejaban sus artefactos para que él los venda, ahora le está yendo muy bien ya que le genera buenos ingresos, por tanto desea comprar más artefactos usados para repararlos y dejarlos en funcionamiento. Este será el crédito número 1 con MFP, por lo que espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual y espera  compenetrarse rápidamente con su banco comunal del cual tiene muy buenas referencia por el compañerismo y solidaridad que existe entre ellos. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará más artefactos en desuso y piezas para restaurarlos y ponerlos en venta.
texts.en: Gladys, who is 33 years old, is a good, nice and very hard-working woman.  She lives with Carlos, who is 42 years old, and they have three children.  They are why she works so much -- in order to offer them a better quality of life.  Gladys's work consists of buying and selling used devices like small electrical appliances or other recycled materials, as well as repairing things for her clients who bring them to her to fix.  Every day, she opens the doors of her home to begin her work. Her merchandise is acquired through recycling, since some people come to her house to make donations and she restores things in order to sell them.  She has been working in this field for 13 years and she does it along with her partner Carlos.  She feels very good about her work since it permits her to have a good income as well as to work at home and see and care for her children as she desires.  At first when she started the business she only did repairs, but with time the clients started leaving their own items for her to sell.  Now things are going well since the business generates good income.  For that reason she wants to purchase more used items in order to repair them and get them working.  This will be her first credit with Kiva partner MFP, and she is hoping for your help so that she can make her plans a reality.  For her part, she promises to punctually meet the scheduled loan repayments and she hopes to integrate quickly into the communal bank since she has heard great things about its collegiality and solidarity.  With the loan that she has requested of 1000 Peruvian soles, she will buy more used items that have fallen out of use as well as parts in order to restore them and put them up for sale.

loans.use: To purchase used devices / small electrical appliances and parts in order to restore the items and sell them.

loans.name: Flora

texts.es: Flora, de 52 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Antonio; su esposo, con quien tiene 6 hijos, pero viven con 2 de ellos: Katerine y Josimar, en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Pampas. Todos los días trabaja sin descanso, se levanta desde los primeros rayos de sol hasta el anochecer. Cuando recién regresa a su casa después de un día de trabajo. Su principal actividad consiste en la siembra de alverja, olluco, papa y cereales, los cuales siembra en terrenos propios ubicados en la zona alta de su localidad. En todo este tiempo gracias a su dedicación y empeño logró adquirir un camión con el que trasporta sus alimentos y lleva a comercializarlos a la capital del país, en uno de los mercados más importantes. Donde viaja una vez a la semana, pues también se dedica a la compra y venta de papa al por mayor, ganando un dinero extra en ello. Pero como mujer de campo también se dedica a la venta de animales, que cría y engorda para obtener buenas ganancias. Ahora desea ahorrar para comprar otro camión, nuevo y mejorado. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Flora, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de papa y olluco.
texts.en:
Flora, aged 52, is a hard-working woman.  She lives with Antonio, her husband, with whom she has six children.  They live with two of them, Katerine and Josimar, in their own home located in the Pampas area.  

She works every day without a break, getting up with the first rays of sun and returning home at dusk after a full day's work.  Her main activity is growing peas, olluco (a root vegetable), potatoes and cereals.  She grows these on her own fields, which are in the higher-altitude part of her area.

In all this time, thanks to her dedication and determination, she has been able to acquire a truck with which she transports her products to sell them in the country's capital city, in one of the most important markets.  She travels there once a week, where she also works buying and selling potatoes at wholesale, thereby earning some extra money.  As a country woman, she also sells animals which she raises and fattens to generate good earnings.

Now she wants to save some money to purchase another truck, which will be new and improved.

This is her second loan with MFP, and she hopes for your collaboration so that she can make her plans a reality.  For her part, she promises to comply with her repayments.  She is also grateful to be part of her communal bank association, as all the members are responsible and supportive people.

On receiving your support, Flora will invest the requested money in the purchase of several sacks of natural fertilizers to apply to her potato and olluco crops.

loans.use: to buy several sacks of fertilizers.

loans.name: Wilmer Yohalmo

texts.es:
Wilber, continua en su negocio de CD, sigue con su familia estable, su puesto de venta siempre está en el mercado, está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo para la compra de un equipo de sonido, este le servirá para realizar las pruebas de los CD, al momento de ofrecerlo  a los clientes.
Él considera que el negocio ha ido mejorando y todo por el apoyo de los prestamos, con los que quiere seguir trabajando para mantenerse competente.
texts.en:
Wilber continues to have a CD business and stable family. He always sells his products in the market. He is asking once again for a loan for the purchase of sound equipment, which will help him test the CDs when he is offering them to customers.

He thinks his business has gotten better, all through the help of the loans. With them, he hopes to continue working to keep himself competent.

loans.use: to buy sound equipment.

loans.name: Fortunata Marcela

texts.es: Fortunata tiene 44 años de edad es conviviente con 03 hijos, la cual sigue apoyando a 01 de ellos. Fortunata se dedica a la confección de tejidos en hilo y lana, negocio que viene realizando hace más de 10 años. Ella se siente orgullosa pues  ha podido apoyara a su pareja con los gastos del hogar y a su hija con sus estudios de enfermería. Fortunata está contenta pues cada vez aumentan sus clientes. Con los deseos de seguir mejorando solicito el crédito para la compra de lanas en mayor cantidad ya que le sale económico y de esta manera entregar sus pedidos a tiempo. A futuro a Fortunata le gustaría habilitar un espacio en su vivienda donde pueda vender hilos y lanas. Fortunata agradece el crédito brindad.
texts.en: Fortunata is 44 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children.  She is still supporting one of her children.  Fortunata weaves products from thread and yarn.  She has been in this business for more than 10 years.  She feels proud because she has been able to support her partner with the household expenses and support her daughter with her nursing studies.  Fortunata is happy because her number of customers continues to grow.  With a desire to continue improving, she requested a loan so that she could buy yarn in larger quantities as it works out cheaper this way.  This will enable her to deliver her orders on time.  In the future, Fortunata would like to fix up a space in her home where she can sell threads and yarn.  She is grateful for her loan.

loans.use: to buy yarn

loans.name: Nidia Liz

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de artesania,la socia vende chompas,chalinas y aretes y collares en plata,ella vende al por mayor y luego los distribuye a las diferentes tiendas donde vende artesania,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de artesania.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar chompas,chalinas,aretes y collares al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues to devote herself to the business of selling handcrafted items. The member sells sweaters, scarves, and silver earrings and necklaces. She buys wholesale and then distributes them to the various shops where handcrafted items are sold. The member's dream is to expand her artisanal products business. 

The member is seeking the loan for purchasing sweaters, scarves, earrings and necklaces wholesale. The member is happy to receive the loan and commits to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase sweaters, scarves, earrings and necklaces wholesale.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en: Eunice is 38 years old and lives with her husband and three children in the town of Kitiri. She earns a living as a farmer and has applied for a loan from   KADET LTD to buy fertilizer, pesticides and seeds to use when planting her next crop. Her goals for the future are to expand her business and begin raising cattle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and seeds.

loans.name: Pinky

texts.en: Pinky is married and the mother of a 15-year-old child. She and her husband earn a living by fishing -- her husband goes to sea in their boat, and she sells the fish he catches in a local market. They work hard to meet their family's needs and pay their child's school fees. She is applying for a loan to buy nets, crab traps and other fishing supplies. She hopes to be able to keep her child in school through college.

loans.use: to buy nets, crab traps and other fishing supplies.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en: For the last 15 years, Mercy has earned a living by selling shoes to people in the town of Nakuru. She is 44 years old, married and the mother of three children. She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our clients and is applying for her first loan, which she will use to buy more shoes to sell. In the future, she hopes to open a wholesale shoe-selling business and distribute shoes to local schools and companies.

loans.use: to buy more shoes to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Alijon

texts.ru: Алижон житель района Кубодиён. Ему 21 год. Он холост. Живет вместе с родителями. Он занимается скотоводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается год. Кредит берет для закупа телят, чтобы увеличить количество скота.
texts.en: Alijon is a resident of the Qubadiyon district.  He is 21 years old, single and lives with his parents.  He is involved in animal husbandry.  Alijon has been in this business for one year.  He is requesting this loan to purchase calves in order to increase livestock quantities.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Dilshod

texts.ru: Дилшод проживает в городе Истаравшан. Он холост. Ему 22 года. Дилшод предоставляет услугу, такси. Он берет кредит для приобретения новой машины.
texts.en: Dilshod lives in the city Istaravshan. He is single. He is 22 years old. Dilshod runs a taxi service. He takes a loan for the purchase of a new car.

loans.use: to purchase a new car

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys es socia del Banco Comunal Manantial, tiene 48 años, tiene una bodega y los sábados vende pescado. Gladys es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 12 años, es casada y madre de 3 hijos.
Gladys empezó su negocio con poco capital y ahora se siente muy bien porque su negocio ha crecido, poco a poco se ha podido comprar una refrigeradora, su televisor, y educar a sus hijos, valora las capacitaciones que le dan  porque aprende mucho con ellas, como por ejemplo la forma de educar a sus hijos. La facilidad con la que recibe  los préstamo le dio la oportunidad de poder tener un negocio, ahora el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de leche, fideos y otros productos para su negocio.
texts.en:
Gladys is a member of the Manantial [Fountain Spring] communal bank. She is 48 years old and has a grocery shop, and on Saturdays she sells fish. Gladys has been a member of Finca Perú for 12 years. She is married and the mother of three children. 

Gladys began her business with a small amount of capital and feels great now because her business has grown. Little by little she has been able to acquire a refrigerator, her television set, and provide an education for her children. She values the trainings which are given because she learns a lot in them, as for example, how to provide an education for her children. The ease with which she receives the loans gave her the opportunity to have a business. The loan she is requesting now will be invested in the purchase of milk, pasta and other products for her business.

loans.use: to purchase milk, pasta and other products for her business.

loans.name: Amira

texts.es: Amira  con su credikiva anterior compró productos naturales que vendió a buen precio porque su inversión la hizo de contado. En la actualidad está planeando acceder a un nuevo credikiva, porque aprovechará la gran demanda de ropa y calzado, a propósito de las festividades de fin de año y esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a una nueva financiación. “Estoy muy agradecida por el apoyo que me brindan a mi y a todas las personas que requieran de un apoyo para cumplir sus sueños. “
texts.en: Amira used her last Kiva loan to buy natural products that she was able to sell for a good profit because she paid cash for them.  She's applying for a new loan that she will use to buy merchandise that she will resell.  She expects a big demand for clothing and footwear from buyers over the holidays and she wants to make the most of the demand.  "I'm very grateful for the support I've received and for all the people who have helped me meet my goals."

loans.use: to buy merchandise for resale.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en: Rosalina is 51 years old, married and the mother of three children who range in age from 12 to 20 years old. Her husband is a fisherman and she helps him sell his fish in a local market. She also sells fish caught by other fishermen, and runs a store where she sells household supplies such as vinegar, cooking oil and kerosene. She works hard to feed her family and keep her three children in school. She is applying for a loan to buy nets, bait and other fishing supplies. She hopes to give her family a good life, including three regular meals a day.

loans.use: to buy nets, bait and other fishing supplies.

loans.name: Serapio

texts.en: Serapio is 56 years old and earns a living as a farmer in the town of Trinidad, Bohol. He is married and has been in his current line of work for 20 years. His main crop is rice and he earns about PHP 6,000 a month. Serapio is applying for a loan to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies. His goal for the future is to continue expanding his farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Los bollos limpios son un alimento de origen indígena, preparado artesanalmente  a base de masa de maíz, envueltos en hojas de mazorca y cocidos o sancochados, típicos y profundamente arraigados en la Costa Caribe colombiana , donde son  preparados y vendidos en las calles por vendedores ambulantes, entre ellos mujeres  con sus inconfundibles pregones, que gradualmente siendo apoyadas en créditos y logrando el crecimiento de su negocio, también  consiguen  de clientes a tiendas de barrio y negocios estacionarias informales al pie de los supermercados o dentro de ellos.  Esta tradición pasó a ser parte del quehacer diario de  Ana, de ascendencia y tradición palanquera,  quien aprendió de su madre y posteriormente  tomó su mayor experiencia, ayudando a sus hermanas, que se dedicaron de manera independiente  a lo mismo una vez murió su progenitora. En la actualidad aunque aun trabajan en la casa paterna,  tienen familias independientes, trabajan unidas y  eso si cada una con sus propios clientes, para lograr el sostenimiento de sus hogares. Ana es una mujer emprendedora y se apoya en sus sobrinos para la producción y distribución de los bollos en 6 tiendas  y un restaurante, ella vende a crédito en las mañanas y recupera su dinero en las horas desde la noche. Ana logró terminar el nivel educativo bachillerato y estudió carreras técnicas de informática y manejo de maquinas planas,  sueña con ser enfermera profesional, así como en lograr que sus dos hijos obtengan una educación universitaria de calidad, para superarse y ser muy exitosos. Esto es justamente el motivo de su persistente trabajo, del cual quiere lograr la totalidad de su potencial crecimiento en maquinarias equipos y generación de empleos. En la actualidad está aplicando  as su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará materias primas como maíz, hojas para envolver y pita para amarrar los productos.  Su éxito radica en poder hacer una inversión en mayores cantidades  que lo usual, pues compra a diario y esto no la deja acceder a los descuentos propios de las compras de contado y en mayor volumen.
texts.en:
"Bollos" [rolls made of white corn] are a food of indigenous origin.  They are handmade with corn dough and wrapped in corn husks and cooked or boiled.  They are traditional and deeply rooted in the Caribbean coast of Colombia, where they are prepared and sold on the street by street vendors.  Among them are women, with their unmistakable hawking, who are gradually being helped by loans and are achieving the growth of their businesses.  They also get customers from stores in the neighborhood and stationary informal businesses outside or inside supermarkets.

This tradition came to be part of the daily chores of Ana, who is of Palenque ancestry and tradition.  [Palenque is a Spanish Creole language.]  She learned it from her mother and later got her best experience helping her sisters, who worked in the same business independently once their mother died.  Currently, although they still work in the family home, they have their own families and work together, each one with her own customers, to support their households.

Ana is an enterprising woman who relies on her nephews for producing and distributing the rolls in six stores and one restaurant.  She sells on credit in the morning and collects her money in the evening.

Ana finished high school and took degree courses in computer science and industrial machine operation.  She dreams about being a professional nurse as well as about getting a quality university education for her children, so they can improve themselves and be very successful.  This is exactly the goal of her persistent work, from which she wants to realize all her potential growth in machine equipment and generating employees.

Currently she is requesting a Kiva loan, the first financing she is getting from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  With it she will buy ingredients such as corn, husks for wrapping, and twine to tie up the products.

Her success lies in being able to invest in larger quantities than normal, since she buys daily and this does not allow her to get the discounts characteristic of wholesale and cash purchases.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as corn, husks for wrapping, and twine to tie up the products.

loans.name: Lisset Vanesa

texts.es:
Lisset es una mujer de 25 años de edad, ella vive en Ica ,Perú esta ciudad se encuentra ubicado en el Desierto de Sechura cerca de cuatro horas al sur de Lima, la capital del país, y es aclamado por los peruanos como "La Tierra del Sol". Es conocida en el Perú por sus frecuentes terremotos (un 8,0 en 2007 y 6.9 en 2011), su producción de uvas, espárragos y aceitunas, y tal vez sobre todo, como la fuente de la bebida tradicional del Perú nacional, el Pisco. En este clima cálido y árido se encuentra la casa y empresa del cliente.  En su tiempo libre Lisset disfruta escuchar música;  como bien se sabe el Perú se caracteriza por tener las comidas más deliciosas del mundo y uno de los platos que Lisset más disfruta son los "Tallarines Verdes”. Lisset estudió hasta culminar por completo la escuela y luego de ello inicio la carrera de “Técnica en enfermería”.

Lisset es conviviente, su pareja es jornalero en un fundo, juntos tienen 1 hijo, el cual aún no tiene la edad suficiente para asistir a la escuela. Lisset se dedica al venta de ropa como re-corredora, ella trabaja a base de pedidos, se dedica a este trabajo 5 horas diarias, ella sabe que su negocio tiene éxito porque sabe que ha atendido muy bien a sus clientes y es por ello le continúan solicitando sus productos. Actualmente desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan ayudarla a poder comprar ropa que está de moda y sobretodo que esté de acuerdo a la temporada de verano.

Esta mejora podrá ayudarle a mejorará principalmente sus ingresos, lo que a su vez le permitirá tener la posibilidad de ahorrar y así adquirir bienes para su comodidad y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Lisset, 25, lives in Ica, Perú.  This city is located in the Sechura Desert about four hours south of Lima, the nation’s capital, and is acclaimed by Peruvians as the “Land of the Sun.” It’s known in Perú for its frequent earthquakes (an 8.0 in 2007 and a 6.9 in 2011), its grape, asparagus and olive production and perhaps above all as the source of Perú’s national beverage: Pisco.  In this hot, dry climate is found our client’s house and business.

In her free time, Lisset enjoys listening to music.  As she’s well aware, Perú is noted for having the world’s most delicious cuisine and one of Lisset’s favorite dishes is “Tallarines Verdes.” Lisset totally completed her schooling and then started the career of “Nursing Technician.”

Lisset has a spouse who works as a day laborer at a large agricultural hacienda; they have a son together who is still too young to attend school.  Lisset sells clothes.  She works based on prior orders.  She spends five hours a day at work.  She knows that her business is successful because she knows that she’s provided good customer service and that’s why they continue to request her products.  She currently would like Kiva lenders to help her buy clothes that are in style and above all that go with the summer season.

This improvement will help her improve her income which in turn will allow her to have the opportunity to save to acquire more assets for her and her family’s comfort.

loans.use: to buy new, better summer clothes to sell.

loans.name: Hugo Orlando

texts.es: Hugo de 55 años de edad es el propietario de una refresquería y piqueteadero, en el centro de la ciudad de Barranquilla, donde vende bebidas refrescantes y alimentos como patacones, queso, entre otros alimentos que sirven como desayuno, almuerzo o cena muchas personas que trabajan en el sector o transeúntes ocasionales. Hugo está vinculado a los programas de crédito de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo desde hace 11 años, en los cuales ha recibido 9 créditos que le han permitido modernizar sus activos, como el enfriador, acondicionar el negocio con una gran carpa, comprar silletería, invertir en mayor volumen en materias primas e insumos y lograr la apertura de otro punto de ventas en un lugar muy concurrido el que atiende su propio hijo.    En la actualidad planea acceder a un credikiva, que invertirá en materias primas e insumos para surtir de alimentos el nuevo punto de ventas, inversión que será exitosa, pues está logrando compras en volúmenes que le facilitan descuentos y porque la realizará en una época, en la que usualmente las ventas se incrementan, porque hay dinero en el amiente, producto de aguinaldos, bonificaciones y primas que reciben los empleados de las empresas y que también mueven la economía informal. Con su negocio Hugo ha logrado el sostenimiento de su hogar conformado por su esposa y sus 5 hijos que hoy están en las edades de 26 a 33 años y con ellos sueña verlos convertidos en personas altamente exitosas.
texts.en: Hugo, 55 years old, is the owner of a refreshment and snack stand in the center of the city of Barranquilla, where he sells refreshing drinks and foods like fried plantains and cheese among other foods that they serve as breakfast, lunch or dinner. Many people that work in the sector are passers-by. Hugo has been linked to the loan programs of Fundación Mario Santo Domingo for 11 years, in which he has received 9 loans that have permitted him to modernize his assets, like the fryer, to cool the business with a large tent, to buy seating, and to invest in a larger volume of raw materials and to open up another point of sales in a busy location that his own son attends to. At present, he plans to access a kiva loan that he will invest in raw materials and supplies in order to stock the new point of sales. This investment will be successful, for he is achieving purchases in volumes that facilitate discounts and because it will take place in a period in which sales usually increase. This increase is due to the fact that there is money in the market as a result of bonuses and allowances given to the employees of businesses that move the economy. With his business Hugo has achieved the maintenance of his household consisting of his wife and his 5 children that today are in the age range of 26 to 33 years old. He dreams to see them become highly successful people.

loans.use: to invest in raw materials and supplies in order to stock food at the new point of sale.

loans.name: Habiba

texts.ru: Хабиба-женщина средних лет, замужем и имеет троих детей.Муж занимается сантехническими работами и получает хорошую прибыль,так как его дело очень востребованный. Сама занимается предпринимательской деятельностью более 10ти лет.Начинала свой бизнес с малого объёма.Около своего дома имела свой гараж,где торговала продуктами питания.Постепенно дети выросли и потребность тоже стала большой. Решила изменить вид товара и по совету родственников которые торгуют женской одеждой,перешла на продажу одежды на центральном рынке. В настоящее время у нее хороший спрос на товар и большой объём товарооборота.Так  как торгует на большом рынке, хочет расшириться на запрашиваемый кредит.
texts.en: Habiba is a middle-age woman, who is married and has three children.  Her husband is involved in plumbing work and earns a good profit because this type of work is in high demand.  Habiba has been involved in entrepreneurial business for over ten years.  She started her business with a small volume.  She had a garage near her home, where she sold food products.  Her children gradually grew up, and the consumption increased.  Based on her relatives' advice, who sell women's clothing, Habiba decided to change the type of merchandise and transitioned to selling clothing at the central market.  She has a good demand for merchandise and a large volume of goods turnover at the present time.  Because she sells at the large market, she wants to expand by using the requested loan.

loans.use: to buy warm clothing for sale

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María es una mujer  de 32 años, ella es madre de 2 hijos, todos ellos viven en casa de los papas de María debido a que ella no cuenta con los ingresos necesarios para poder adquirir una casa propia, pero ella esta haciendo todo lo posible para poder sacar a sus dos pequeños adelante y por fin brindarlas un hogar propio, para poder encaminarse y lograr este objetivo decidió dedicarse a la venta de chupetes, luego de eso empezó a crecer un poco más y decidió dedicarse a vender canchita, sandwinchs de pollo, también refrescos en la parte frontal del hogar en donde vive, luego de lograr buenas ventas y haber logrado juntar una buena cantidad de dinero, logró crear una tienda de abarrotes, negocio al que le dedica todo su tiempo.

Ella desea que los inversionistas Kiva puedan apoyarla y así poder comprar nuevos productos para ofrecer, actividad que le generará mejores y nuevos ingresos, ella está muy feliz por esta oportunidad y sabe que logrará un buen nivel de ventas.
texts.en:
María, 32, is the mother of two children; they all live together in María’s parents’ house because she lacks the necessary income to buy a house of her own but she’s doing everything possible to move her two little ones ahead and eventually provide a home of their own for them.  To head in this direction and reach this goal, she decided to start selling lollipops.  After that she started to grow a little and decided to star selling “canchita” [roasted corn kernels], chicken sandwiches and also soft-drinks in front of her house where she lives.  Having attained good sales and saved up a good amount of money, she managed to create a grocery store, a business she dedicates all her time to.

She would like Kiva lenders to support her so that she can buy new products to offer which will generate new, better income.  She’s happy about this opportunity and sure that she’ll reach good sales levels.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Santos Francisco

texts.es:
Santos Francisco, tiene 35 años de edad, es casado, tiene 6 hijos de 15, 13, 11,9 y 7 año y uno de 5 meses de edad, vive en la aldea San Pedro, Intibucá.
Santos toda su vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura, pero hace 3 años esta cultivando una parcela propia de papas y otra parcela de fresas, la producción que saca la distribuye en el mercado local.
Esta solicitando 20,000 lempiras para invertirlo en fertilizante e insumos y para darle una mejor asistencia técnica al cultivo, logrando así controlar las plagas para sacar una buena cosecha.
Todo este esfuerzo y dedicación es para obtener ingresos que cubran gastos de educación  y alimentación  de sus hijos, y poder darle un mejor nivel de vida su familia.
texts.en:
Santos Francisco, 35, is married and has six children who are 15, 13, 11, 9 and 7 years old and one that is 5 months old.  He lives in the village of San Pedro, Intibucá.  Santos has spent his entire life farming but for the last three years has been farming his own plot of potatoes and another parcel of strawberries.  What he produces he sells in the local market.

He’s asking for a 20000 Lempira loan to buy fertilizer and farm supplies to provide better technical assistance to his crops attaining pest control so that he can produce a better harvest.  All of this effort and dedication is in order to earn income to cover education and food costs for his children and to provide his family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and fertilizer.

loans.name: Sop Serigne Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 09/12/2010 IL est composé de 18 femmes issues du même village.Elles ont pour activités le petit commerce, l'agriculture et l'élevage ovine. 

Soda debout à droite sur la photo est responsable du groupe, elle est âgée de 23 ans et à en charge 03 enfants.

Elle a pour activité principale le petit commerce de produits halieutiques(poissons séchés, huitres, crevettes)

Son prêt lui permettra de s'approvisionner en marchandises pour satisfaire sa clientèle et réaliser des revenus financier. 

Son objectif est d'agrandir son commerce et subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 9, 2010. It is composed of eighteen women from the same village. Their work involves small-scale commerce, farming, and raising sheep. 

Soda, who is standing at the right in the photo, is the group’s official. She is 23 years old and has three children to support. Her main work involves small-scale commerce in seafood (dried fish, oysters, shrimp). 

Her loan will enable her to stock up on merchandise to satisfy her customers and to make an income. 

Her goal is to expand her business and to meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy seafood products

loans.name: Anabell

texts.es:
Anabel tiene 34 años de edad, es soltera, y vive con sus padres en la aldea La lechuga de cholomas, cortes.
Anabel trabajo en una maquila, pero su aspiración a obtener mas ingresos para ayudar a sus padres decidió independizarse  obteniendo su propio negocio,el cual es una pulpería, que logro  establecer hace 8 años, vendiendo productos de la canasta básica, como frijoles, arroz, harina, azúcar, etc. y productos de abarrotería a la cual le dedica todo el día. 
Actualmente esta solicitando su  segundo préstamos de  12,000 lempiras para poder invertir en su pulpería en la compra de harina, arroz, azúcar, huevos, pan.etc. Su meta es darle a sus clientes mejor atención en los productos y  obtener más ganancias.
texts.en:
Anabel, 34, is single living with her parents in the village of Lechuga de Cholomas, Cortes.  Anabel worked in an assembly plant but she wanted to earn more income to help her parents so decided to become independent and open a business of her own which is a grocery store; she managed to do so 8 years ago. She sells basic staple items like beans, rice, flour, sugar, etc. and other grocery items; she spends all day at work.

She is currently asking for a 12000 Lempira loan to buy grocery items like flour, sugar, rice, eggs, bread, etc.  Her goal is to provide better customers service with respect to products and to earn higher profits.

loans.use: to buy flour, beans, sugar, bread, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Alexander Invierno

texts.es:
Alexander es un hombre de 27 años, el tiene una pequeña casita en un lugar muy, muy humilde, para poder ganar el dinero que necesita para vivir, se dedica a la venta de sandalias en el mercado de su ciudad, se ha dedicado a este negocio hace aproximadamente un año, para poder crear este tipo de negocio tuvo que hacer muchas cosas, como por ejemplo, trabajar en un restaurante, ser albañil de construcción e incluso a trabajado en chacras.

Él sabía que para salir adelante tenía que forjarse por sí solo es por esto que explotó sus habilidades como vendedor para independizarse y obtener sus propios ingresos sin depender  de otros. Sabe que los estudios son la fuente principal del desarrollo personal y profesional, es por esto que en algún momento desea poder estudiar la carrera de Administración de empresas.

Cuando Alexander se inicio en la venta de sandalias, nada le resulto fácil debido a que no conocía nada del negocio, hacía malas compras y escogía tallas que no eran las ideales, pero con la experiencia que iba ganando, aprendió el mejor método para poder comprar. Actualmente el desea un préstamo de S/. 1,500 para comprar sandalias de distintos modelos exclusivos para chicas. Su sueño es tener un negocio mucho más grande y poder estudiar lo que desea, para así mejorar como vendedor y microempresario.
texts.en:
Alexander is a 27 year old man. He has a small home in a very, very modest location. In order to make a living, he sells sandals in the city market. He has had this business for approximately one year. In order get to where he is now, he has had to do a lot of things; for example, working in a restaurant, being a construction bricklayer, and working on farms.
He knew that in order to get ahead he had to forge ahead for himself. For this reason he took advantage of his skills as a vendor and became independent in order to make his own income without depending on anyone else. He knows that an education is the best source of personal and professional development; so he wants to study business administration sometime.
When Alexander started selling sandals, none of it came easy. He knew nothing about the business, made bad purchases and chose less than ideal sizes. However, with the experience that he has gained along the way, he learned the best buying methods. He now wants a loan of 1,500 soles to purchase different and exclusive types of women's sandals. His dream is to have a much larger business and to be able to study what he wants; this way he will improve as a vendor and a businessman.

loans.use: to buy seasonal women's sandals.

loans.name: Komiljon

texts.ru: Комилжон разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. Ему 56 лет. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Он берет кредит для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Komiljon breeds cattle at home.  He is 56 years old, married and has six children.  Komiljon is requesting this loan to purchase cattle.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant,el socio prepara desayunos,alnuerzos y cenas,el socio atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijo,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de restaurant.El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne,pollo y verduras al por mayor.
 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues in the restaurant business; he makes breakfasts, lunches and dinners from 8am until 9pm.  Thanks to this business he’s able to support his son.  His dream is to enlarge the restaurant.  He’s asking for the loan to buy products to cook like meat, chicken and vegetables at wholesale.  He’s happy about the loan and commits to continue making his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to cook like meat, chicken and vegetables at wholesale.

loans.name: Corazones Unidas Ii Group

texts.es:
El comité Corazones unidas II  está compuesto por 12  integrantes de la ciudad de Encarnación, son clientes desde Diciembre del año pasado. Ellas son mujeres con muchas ganas de salir adelante y de esa forma poder ayudar a sus familiares.
Una de las integrantes, Gladys de 50 años, tiene 3 hijos, es madre soltera  y nos cuenta que ella trabaja de modista, tiene su propio taller de costura en el cual trabaja todos los días. Ella dice que gracias a Dios tiene bastante trabajo, lo que la ayuda a mantener su casa y también a sus familiares.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, cierres, botones y demás insumos necesarios para poder cumplir con los pedidos que tiene. Agradece a la fundación por la oportunidad que recibe por parte de kiva y fundación paraguaya.
texts.en:
The “Corazones Unidas II” committee is composed of 12 members from the city of Encarnación; they’ve been clients since December of last year.  They are women who very much want to get ahead to help their families that way.  

One of the members is Gladys, 50.  She has three children and is a single mother.  She tells us that she works as a seamstress.  She has her own sewing workshop where she works every day.  She says that thanks to God she has enough work which helps her support her house and her family.

She requested the loan to buy fabric, thread, zippers, buttons and other sewing supplies needed to fill her pending orders.  She thanks the Fundación for the opportunity she’s getting through Kiva and Fundación Paraguaya.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis es un joven de 29 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de nazca, ciudad caracterizada por su clima cálido, así como también por las majestuosas líneas de nazca, por la cual la ciudad alberga infinidad de turistas, Luis como buen peruano le gusta la comida, por ello su plato favorito es el riquísimo Adobo de Pollo, Luis estudio hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Ingeniería Civil; Luis es conviviente y junto a su pareja tiene un pequeño de 4 años, el cual esta cursando educación inicial.

Luis trabaja actualmente como albañil (Construcción de viviendas, entre otros), se dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 8 horas diarias y puede atender de 1 a 2 clientes por día por lo laborioso de su trabajo, el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque el realiza una buena labor así como también el va de casa en casa o donde hay obras de construcción para ofrecer sus servicios y por ello lo conocen y lo recomiendan.

Luis está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá construir su cuarto, ya que actualmente vive en un ambiente inadecuado y sobre todo que su pequeño en temporada de invierno se enferma mucho, con esta mejora podrá brindarle una mejor calidad de vida y sobre todo seguridad para su familia; Luis seguirá trabajando muy duro porque quiere cumplir uno de sus mas grandes sueños: “Darle una buena educación a su hijo y ser un contratista de grandes obras”.
texts.en:
Luis is a young 29-year-old. He lives in Nazca, a city characterized by its hot climate and the majestic Nazca Lines which draw countless tourists. Luis, like a good Peruvian, likes food. His favourite dish is the rich Adobo de Pollo. Luis studied until the fifth grade of secondary school, but he would have liked to study civil engineering. Luis lives with his partner, and they have a little four-year-old who is in primary school.
Luis currently works as a bricklayer, building homes and other buildings. He works approximately eight hours a week and is able to serve one or two clients per day. He works hard, and he believes that it is going very well for him because he does good work, and because he goes door to door and to construction sites to offer his services. Clients know him and recommend his services.
Luis is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to your help he will be able to build a room. His home is inadequate at the moment, and his little son gets sick often in the winter months. With this improvement, he will be able to offer his son a better quality of life as well as security for their whole family. Luis will continue to work very hard because he wants to achieve one of his dearest dreams: "To give my son a good education and to be a contractor on big projects."

loans.use: to build a room

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de productos de belleza y tambien sigue trabajando en un empresa publica y los productos de belleza lo vende en forma independiente,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de productos de belleza.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cremas y perfumes al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
She is still selling beauty products, and she is also still working for a company. She sells her beauty products independently. Her dream is to expand her beauty products business. She is requesting this loan to buy cream and perfume wholesale.
She is happy to have this loan and promises to repay her quotas.

loans.use: to buy cream and perfume wholesale

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es: Marcelina tiene 43 años, es una mujer soltera y trabajadora, que vive en compañía de su mamá Julia, de 78 años, a la que cuida y atiende en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay, distrito de Huasahuasi. Marcelina es una mujer de buen corazón. Su principal actividad es la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su tienda de comestibles, donde todas las mañanas desde muy temprano abre sus puertas para comercializarlos a los pobladores de su localidad. Por las tarde se dirige a sus cultivos de papa, maíz y arveja, los cuales cuida desde hace 20 años. Ahora que su madre no puede ayudarla en esa laboras, ella sola tiene que arreglárselas para no descuidar su producción. En todo este tiempo pudo aprender no solo las técnicas de cultivo, también a saber comercializar sus cosechas a buen precio. En el mercado mayorista de su ciudad, siempre es la que más éxito tiene.
