His investment will be successful because he will invest at a time when food consumption is increasing, especially consumption of fast food, because there is a lot of money in circulation.

loans.use: to buy a pizza oven and tables and plastic chairs to make his customers more comfortable.

loans.name: Elbia Estrella

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal San Patricio se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Cuba en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.

En este lugar vive la señora Elbia, tiene 44 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 16 y 6 años de edad los mismos que estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido es comerciante.
 
Ella con la finalidad de ayudar a su esposo con su negocio y con esto contribuir en los gastos del hogar realiza el crédito para que su esposo lo utilice en su negocio, el cual consiste en la venta de agua de coco,  él todos los días se dirige con su carreta cerca a  un asadero de pollos de la ciudad, en este lugar vende la deliciosa agua de coco helada, lleva más de 5 años dedicado a esta actividad y gracias a esto ha podido sacar adelante a su familia.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar cocos, vasos de plástico, sorbetes, servilletas entre otras cosas necesarias en su negocio. Lleva  más de 5 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque gracias a su primer crédito su esposo empezó con este negocio.

Su sueño es  tener un carro para ir a comprar sus productos directamente de los productores.
texts.en:
The communal bank 'San Patricio' meets every 15 days in the neighborhood of Cuba in the city of Manta. A city known for its beautiful beaches that are widely visited in every season of the year and for being a beautiful city without comparison with many tourist attractions.
Elbia lives in this place.  She is 44 years old and is in a common-law marriage of which she has two children of 16 and 6 years of age.  The children are in school.  The husband is a merchant.
She requests the loan with the goal of helping her husband with his business and in that way contribute to the household expenses.  Her husband will use the loan in his business, which is the sale of coconut water.  Everyday he takes his vending cart close to a grilled chicken place in the city.  In this place he sells the delicious iced coconut water.  He has been dedicated to this business for more than 5 years and thanks to it he has been able to improve his family's standard of living.
She is going to use the loan to buy coconuts, plastic cups, straws, napkins among other things that are necessary for his business.  She has been with the communal bank for more than 5 years, and she likes it because thanks to the first loan her husband started this business.
Her dream is to have a car so she can go directly to the producers to buy her products.

loans.use: to buy coconuts, plastic cups, straws, napkins, etc.

loans.name: Ana Rocio

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal San Patricio se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Cuba en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.

En este lugar vive la señora Ana, tiene 41 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos niñas de 3 años las mismas que son gemelas. El marido es maestro carpintero. 

Ella además de ser una gran madre y ama de casa, también se dedica al comercio, vende pescado por libras, tiene un local en su casa en el cual en las mañanas se dedica a la venta de pescado por libras y por las tardes y noches se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas. A ella le encanta trabajar ya que con esto se gana sus propios ingresos los cuales le sirven para ayudar a su marido en la dura tarea que es mantener su hogar. En su negocio vende hot dogs, hamburguesas, empanadas y batidos de frutas,  lleva más de 20 años dedicada a esta labor y le ha ido bastante bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar pescado, carne, salchichas, pan, frutas, etc.  para preparar los alimentos. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos ha podido comprar ciertas cosas necesarias en su negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener un gran local o un restaurante.
texts.en: The San Patricio Community Bank meets every 15 days in the Cuba barrio in the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches and for being a place of unmatched beauty with many tourist attractions. It is here we find Ana, who is 41 years old and has twin 3-year-old daughters with her common-law husband, who is a master carpenter. Along with being a great mother and housewife, Ana makes a living selling fish by the pound. She has a space set up in her house to sell fish in the morning and to sell fast food in the afternoon and evening. She loves to work because she makes her own income to help her husband with the tough task of providing for the household. At her business she sells hot dogs, hamburgers, empanadas and fruit smoothies. She has more than 20 years of experience with this work and it has been going rather well. She plans to use the loan to purchase fish, meat, sausages, bread, fruit and other items to prepare her meals. She has been with the community bank since its inception and likes it because thanks to the loan she has been able to purchase certain things necessary for her business. Her dream is to have a big store or restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase fish, meat, sausage, bread, fruit, etc.

loans.name: María Liliana

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal San Patricio se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Cuba en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora María, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos,  dos de ellos ya  mayores de edad y el ultimo de 16 años que  estudian en colegio, todos sus hijos  aun vive con ella. Su esposo es chofer.

Ella tiene una tienda general en su casa en la cual vende todo tipo de productos, tanto productos de primera necesidad como también ciertos artículos de bazar, medicinas,  pescado y carnes por libra, allí trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su hijo y su esposo le ayudan en su trabajo cuando pueden, su negocio lo tiene ya por más de 4  años y le ha ido  muy bien ya que poco a poco lo ha ido aumentando y esto gracias a  los créditos.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, productos de bazar y de de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 7 años y le gusta porque con el crédito empezó su negocio y lo ha mejorado.
  
Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en: The San Patricio Community Bank meets every 15 days in the Cuba barrio of the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches and for being a place of unmatched beauty with many tourist attractions. It is here we find María, who is 42 years old, married and has three children: two who are grown up and a 16-year-old in high school. All of her children still live with her. Her husband is a taxi driver. She has a general store in her home selling all kinds of products, whether they be groceries of primary need or medicines, fish and meat by the pound. She works every day from 6 a.m. until 8 p.m. and sometimes even later. Her son and husband help her when they can. She has had the business for more than four years and it has gone very well, growing little by little thanks to the loans. She plans to use this loan to stock up on more supplies, buying rice, sugar, oil, detergents and other groceries and products of primary need. She has been with the community bank for seven years and likes it because with the loans she started her business and has improved it. Her goals are to keep making headway with her business and for her store to grow more every day.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergents and other groceries and products of primary need.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise and improve her store.

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en: Saumu is a 27-year-old married woman with one child who is enrolled in school. She owns a house with electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for her family. Saumu has operated a clothes selling business for the past three years. Her clients are her neighbors and friends. She faces a major challenge of seasonality. She dreams of expanding her business. With this 30,000 Kenyan shilling loan, she wants to purchase more clothes and lesos or kanga [traditional rectangular cloth from East Africa] for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access funds to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes and lesos (kanga) for resale.

loans.name: Sharof

texts.ru: Шароф проживает в городе Исфара. Он женат. Ему 49 лет. У него четверо детей. Он занимается торговлей сухофруктов, он в основном продает курагу. Этим видом деятельности занимается 28 лет. Кредит берет для закупа сухофруктов.
texts.en: Sharof lives in the town of ISfara. He is married. He is 49 years old. He has four children. He sells dried fruits, mostly dried apricots. He has been in this business for 28 years. He is taking out a loan to buy dried fruits.

loans.use: to buy dried fruits

loans.name: Clara Irlanda

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal San Patricio se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Cuba en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Clara, tiene 51 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos todos mayores de edad, dos de sus hijos  aun vive con ella junto a sus familias. Su esposo es chofer.
 
Ella en sociedad con uno de sus hijos tienen un taller de mecánica automotriz en el cual además de reparar todo tipo de automotores también venden aceites, lubricantes y repuestos de vehículos. Mientras su hijo realiza los trabajos de mecánica ella se encarga de la venta de estos productos, sus ventas están aseguradas ya que allí mismo sus clientes comparan lo que necesitan. Lleva más de 8 años con su negocio y les va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar ciertos repuestos para automóviles que necesita para surtir su negocio. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 2 años y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y a bajos intereses.
 
Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y tener buena salud.

En la foto está la socia con su nieto.
texts.en:
The village bank San Patricio meets every 15 days in the Cuba neighborhood in the city of Manta. This city is known for its beautiful beaches that get a lot of visitors all year long, and for being an incredibly beautiful city with a lot of tourist attractions.

Here we meet Clara, 51, who is married and has 3 grown children, 2 of whom still live with her along with their families. Her husband is a chauffeur. 

Together with one of her sons she has a mechanics workshop where they repair all types of cars and also sell oil, lubricant, and repair parts. While her son makes the repairs, she is in charge of the sales, which are guaranteed because her customers buy what they need there. She has been in this business for 8 years and it's going very well.

This loan will be used to buy certain car repair parts that they need to stock their store. She has been in the village bank for 2 years and likes it because the loans are quick and low interest. 

Her goals are to keep making progress with her business and to have good health.

In this photo she is with her grandson.

loans.use: to buy car repair parts.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es: Alicia de 53 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Cartagena con sus dos hijos en las edades de 25 a 27 años. Allí  tiene su propia tienda, donde vende ranchos, víveres, abarrotes y refrescos; este negocio lo inició cuando llegó a la ciudad de Cartagena, desde el año 2002, en condición de mujer separada y  con sus dos hijos. Así fue como con la ayuda de su hermano,  inició con una pequeña tienda, con el fin de sacar adelante a sus hijos y brindarles oportunidades de estudio y bienestar; tal como en la  actualidad ha ocurrido,  pues  ellos han logrado estudios universitarios y están convertidos en personas de buenas costumbres y muy trabajadores. Con su potencial de crecimiento y sus deseo de superación personal y familiar,  ha logrado fortalecer su negocio; ella ha estado vinculada a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización con la que ha tenido 3 financiamientos; en la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva, que es el cuarto financiamiento, con el que aumentará un poco mas su capital, aprovechando que se acerca la época de mayor volumen de ventas,  en la cual Alicia debe estar preparada con mucho surtido de mercancía, para lograr aumentar también sus ingresos y posicionarse aun mas, por eso comprará bebidas, refrescos, abarrotes, embutidos, entre otros articulos de la canasta familiar, en mayor volumen que el acostumbrado, para obtener mejores descuentos y manejar sus productos con precios especiales .
texts.en: Alicia, 53, lives in the city of Cartagena with her two children ages 25 to 27 years. There she has her own store, selling ranches, food, groceries and beverages.  This business was started when she reached the city of Cartagena in 2002, as a separated woman with her two children. So it was with the help of her brother that she began with a small shop in order to raise her children and provide them with opportunities for education and welfare, as has now happened, they have succeeded in college and have become hard working people of good character. With her growth potential and desire to excel personally, she has strengthened her business.  She has been linked to the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, an organization with which she has had 3 loans, and currently she is applying to KIVA, which is the fourth financing. With this she will increase her capital a little more, taking advantage of approaching the time of peak sales, in which Alicia must be prepared with a great merchandise assortment in order to increase her income and position herself even more. For that, she will buy drinks, soft drinks, groceries, meats, among other items, in greater volume than usual, in order to obtain better discounts and manage her products with special prices.

loans.use: to buy drinks, soft drinks, groceries, meats amongst other items.

loans.name: Seynabou

texts.fr: Madame Seynabou  est âgée  de 60 ans. Elle habite au Sénégal. Elle est mariée et mère de 11 enfants dont l’âge  varie entre 14 et 42 ans. Elle s’active dans le secteur du commerce depuis plus de 10ans, plus particulièrement dans la vente de denrées alimentaires. Elle a choisi cette activité pour des raisons financières car son objectif est de satisfaire les besoins de sa famille. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC et sollicite un crédit de 150 000 frs prévu pour s’approvisionner en denrées alimentaires  pour  relancer son activité qui avait connu un ralentissement ces derniers temps.
texts.en: Seynabou is 60 years old and lives in Senegal.  She is married and the mother of 11 children, ranging in age between 14 and 42 years.  For more than ten years now, she has been actively involved in business, particularly in the sale of food products.  She chose this activity for financial reasons, because her goal is to meet the needs of her family.  She is a member of one of the local branches of UIMCEC and is requesting a loan in the amount of 150,000 francs. With this loan, she plans to buy food products and boost her activity, which had recently slowed down.

loans.use: to buy food products for resale.

loans.name: Mame Marieme Thior

texts.fr: Madame Mame Marième Thior vit au Sénégal  et est âgée de 45 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 7 enfants dont l’âge  varie entre  6 et 26 ans.  Elle évolue dans le secteur du commerce et vend depuis plus de 3 ans des tissus  et de s chaussures. Elle a choisi cette activité par passion  mais aussi a cause de sa rentabilité. Elle est membre d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC depuis septembre 2009.Elle sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu pour se procurer des chaussures qu’elle va revendre a sa clientèle. Son objectif  est  de rendre plus rentable son activité et parvenir a améliorer la situation sociale de sa famille.
texts.en: Mame Marième Thior lives in Senegal.  She is 45 years old, married, and the mother of 7 children whose ages range between 6 and 26 years.  She is involved in business and has been selling fabrics and shoes for more than 3 years.  She has chosen this activity out of passion, but also for its profitability.  She has been a member of one of the local UIMCEC branches since 2009.  She is requesting a loan of 100,000 francs.  This loan will be used to purchase shoes, which will be resold to her customers.  Her goal is to improve the profitability of her business as well as her family's social condition.

loans.use: to buy shoes for resale.

loans.name: Olimjon

texts.ru: Олимчон житель района Дангары. Ему 51 год. Он уже три года как занимается торговлей на рынке. В основном он продает национальные платья. Олимчон женат. У него четверо детей. Он берет кредит для увеличения ассортимента товара.
texts.en: Olimjon is a resident of the Dangara region.  He is 51 years old and for three years he has been engaged in trade at the market.  Primarily, he sells traditional dresses.  Olimjon is married and has four children.  He is taking out a loan to increase his assortment of merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase embroidered dresses

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor Manuel es un señor de 47 años de edad, el cual vive con su esposa e hijos, en una comunidad llamada el Upala de San Carlos, en la provincia de Alajuela. En Alajuela existen cinco parques nacionales, una reserva nacional de fauna silvestre, cinco zonas protectoras y varias reservas forestales. También en la provincia se ubica el Museo Juan Santamaría, el cual exhibe artesanías producidas localmente. Esta zona ocupa el primer lugar nacional en la producción de café y azúcar de caña.

Desde hace tres años que Víctor Manuel se dedica a la ganadería, ya que cuenta en estos momentos con una finca, pero le falta lo principal para que su negocio surja y para que los vecinos de su comunidad se vean beneficiados. 

Actualmente Víctor Manuel está solicitando un micro crédito de ¢400.000 (cuatrocientos mil colones) para la compra de cuatro terneros machos de engorde. Con esto el espera hacer crecer su negocio y mejorar tanto su calidad de vida como la de su familia. 

Víctor Manuel es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Delirio, una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su primer préstamo y con él espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Victor Manuel is a 47 year old man who lives with his wife and children in a community called Upala de San Carlos in the Alajuena province. There are five national parks in Alajuela, one national reserve of wildlife, five protected areas and several forrest reserves. Also in the province is the Juan Santamaría Museum, which displays locally made artwork. This area is first in the national for coffee and sugarcane production.

For three years Victor Manuel has made a living raising livestock, and right now he has a farm, but he doesn't have the money he needs for his business to prosper and for the neighbors in his community to benefit. 

Right now Victor Manuel is asking for a micro loan of 400,000 colones for the purchase of four male fattening calves. With this he hopes to expand his business improve his quality of life as well as that of his family. 

Victor Manuel is a member of the Communal Credit of Delirio Company, one of the 150 social organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica. This will be his first loan and with it he hopes to continue growing on a personal and economic level, on top of participating actively in the credit organization in his community.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Santalat

texts.ru:
Санталат 49 лет, замужем, воспитывает  четверых детей. В 1986 году, в поисках источника финансирования для своей семьи, Санталат начала свой бизнес в животноводстве.  
Благодаря упорному труду Санталат, ее хозяйство, начатое с суммы 15,000 сом (KGS) на сегодня приносит около 8,000 сом от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Санталат обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Санталат планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Santalat is 49 years old, married, and raising four children.  In 1986, looking for a source of income for her family, Santalat started her own animal husbandry business.  Thanks to her hard work, her farming business, which was started with an initial capital of 15,000 som (KGS) currently brings close to 8,000 som (KGS) from the sale of milk and dairy products.  In order to further develop her business, Santalat has turned to "Bai Tushum and Partners" for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS).  She will use this loan to purchase additional head of cattle.  She is planning to invest her revenues to further increase cattle headcount.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Hurshed

texts.ru:
Хуршед молодой человек, женат , отец двоих детей. Жена домохозяйка, занимается воспитание детей. Хуршед торгует на рынке электрическими плитками и приборами.Он в летний сезон занимается закруткой и консервированием маринованной продукции и компотов. Он мастер своего дела, у него много постоянных клиентов оптовиков. Живёт он в секционной квартире. На полученную прибыль он смог отремонтировать квартиру и обновить канализационные трубы.
Хуршед в организации кредитуется четвёртый год,и ни разу не нарушал условий кредитования. Он доволен сотрудничать и расширять свой бизнес. На полученный кредит он хочет купить несколько видов электро плиток и запастись стеклотарой для закруток на лето,т.к сеча в несезонн можно купить подешевле.
texts.en:
Hurshed is a young man, he is married and is a father of two children. His wife is a homemaker, she is raising children. Hurshed sells electrical stoves and appliances on the market. During the summer he seals and cans pickled products and compotes. He is a master of his craft and has many loyal wholesale customers. He lives in a sectioned apartment. He was able to renovate the apartment and upgrade sewer pipes using the collected profit.

Hurshed has been taking out loans at this organization for the fourth year and has never violated the terms of lending. He is pleased to collaborate and expand his business. He wants to buy several types of electrical stoves using the received loan and to stock up on empty glass containers for sealing of the pickles in the summer because those can be purchased cheaply during off-season.

loans.use: to purchase electric stoves.

loans.name: Hamida

texts.ru: Хамида проживает в городе Исфара. Ей 54 года. У него пятеро детей. Его муж и дети находятся в России. Сама Хамида занимается торговлей фруктов. Этим видом деятельности занимается 20 лет. Кредит берет для покупки гранаты, апельсинов, мандаринов, хурмы и яблок.
texts.en: Hamina lives in the town of Isfara. She is 54 years old and has five children. Her husband and children and now in Russia. Hamida sells fruits and has been in this business for twenty years. She is taking out the loan to buy pomegranates, oranges, mandarins, persimmons and apples.

loans.use: to buy pomegranates, oranges, mandarins, persimmons and apples.

loans.name: Teresa Del Carmen

texts.es: Teresa del Carmen vive con sus dos hijos, ella posee una tienda en el lugar de su residencia donde vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, frijoles, leche entre otros, se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente pues sus productos son de primera calidad y a un buen precio  además el servicio es excelente; Teresa es una mujer emprendedora con muchas metas por alcanzar, quiere ver crecer su negocio y siempre se encuentra adelante de la competencia, piensa que todas las personas tienen la capacidad de superarse y alcanzar el triunfo, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, producto instantáneo, embutidos, etc. Teresa del Carmen tiene la esperanza de que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Teresa del Carmen lives with her two children. She has a store in her house where she sells basic necessity products like rice, beans, and milk, among others. She has a lot of customers because her products are top quality and well priced. Additionally, her service is excellent. Teresa is an entrepreneurial woman with many goals to get ahead. She wants to see her business grow and always finds herself ahead of the competition. She thinks that everyone has the capacity to excel and achieve success. It is due to this that she decided to request from INTEGRAL a loan that allows her to buy basic grains, candies, instant products, sausages, etc. Teresa del Carmen hopes that, in this way, she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, candies, instant products and sausage.

loans.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es: Norma del Carmen vive con su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos; ella posee una venta de comida en el lugar de su residencia, ricos desayunos y almuerzos, carne asada, pollo, sopas ensaladas entre otros, se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente, pues su comida está hecha con productos de primera calidad y tiene un sabor exquisito además el precio es realmente accesible; Norma es una mujer emprendedora dispuesta a cumplir todos sus objetivos, uno de ellos es mantenerse adelante de la competencia  y nunca decepcionar a su clientela, piensa que en la vida hay que hacer lo mejor que pueda y siempre llegar hasta el final, está totalmente dispuesta, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar carnes, verduras, granos básicos, bebidas, etc. Norma del Carmen tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Norma del Carmen lives with her partner and their three children. She has a business in her house selling food like delicious breakfasts and lunches, roasted meat, chicken, soups, salads, among others. She has a lot of customers since her food is made with top quality products and it has a exquisite flavor and the price is accessible. Norma in an entrepreneurial woman focused on achieving all of her goals. One of them is to get ahead of the competition and never deceive her customers. She thinks that, in life, you must do the best you can and always be prepared until the end. It is due to this that she has decided to request from INTEGRAL a loan that allows her to buy meat, vegetables, basic grains, drinks, etc. Norma del Carmen is confident that she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy meats, vegetables, basic grains and drinks.

loans.name: María Esperanza

texts.es: María Esperanza de sesenta años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de ropa y una pequeña pupuseria los fines de semana, es muy conocida en la localidad, vende ropa en su vivienda y también de forma ambulante todo lo que comercia es de excelente calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable los clientes siempre quedan satisfechos al comprar sus productos; María es una mujer trabajadora con mucho entusiasmo de salir adelante y cumplir sus metas, piensa que su mayor secreto es la constancia  y la dedicación solo así podrá alcanzar el éxito, está dispuesta a hacer crecer el negocio es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor blusas, camisas, pantalones, vestidos, faldas entre otros. María Esperanza tiene la confianza de que de esta forma logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Esperanza, who is 60 years old, lives with her partner and their children in their own house. She has a business selling clothing and a small "pupuseria" business on weekends. She is well known in the area. She sells clothes from her house and also on foot. Everything she sells is of excellent quality and she sells it at accessible prices. Additionally, her service is unequalled. Customers always are satisfied when they buy her products. Maria is a hard-working woman with a lot of enthusiasm to get ahead and achieve her goals. She thinks that her greatest secret is consistency and dedication. Only in this way is she able to achieve success. She is committed to growing her business and, for this reason, has decided to request from INTEGRAl a loan that allows her to buy clothing at wholesale prices like blouses, shirts, pants, dresses, skirts, among others. Maria Esperanza is confident that in this way she will achieve to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy blouses, shirts, pants, dresses, skirts.

loans.name: Colonias Unidas Group

texts.es:
Antonia cuenta 35 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja tiene 4 hijos los cuales están estudiando Yulisa tiene 15 años pero ya no estudia, José Manuel esta en 5° de primaria, Jacqueline en 3° de primaria, Guadalupe 2° de preescolar su esposo se llama sabino es albañil.

Ella se dedica al comercio vende mangos y dulces tiene 5 meses con el negocio lo cual dice que le va muy bien es un negocio pequeño pero a ella le gusta trabajar ella dice que espera mantener el negocio así o mas surtido, e invertirá su préstamo en la compra de los dulces y los mangos con chile y herramienta para el trabajo de su esposo ya que es albañil, a doña Antonia le gustaría poner una tienda de abarrotes ella espera levantar ese negocio e ir incrementado.

Antonia pertenece al grupo colonias unidas cuyo nombre es porque las integrantes son de varias colonias el grupo esta integrado por 11 personas las cuales todas son mujeres trabajadoras a continuación serán mencionadas: Elizabeth, Leocadia, Maria del Carmen, Olivia, Virginia, Delfina, Natalia, Ofelia, Norma, Domitila, todas realizan una actividad comercial como son: venta de dulces, venta de comida, huaraches, perfumes, Lenceria, chivos, etc.
texts.en:
Antonia is 35 years old. She lives in civil union with her partner. She has four children who are students. Yulisa is 15 years old but she doesn't study anymore. Jose Manual is in 5th grade, Jacqueline is in 3rd grade and Guadalupe is in the second year of pre-school. Her husband is named Sabino and he is a mason.

She is dedicated to selling mangos and sweets. She has had this business for five months and she says that it is going very well. It is a small business but she likes to work. She says that she hopes to keep the business stocked and will invest the loan in the purchase of sweets and mangos with chilli and tools for her husband's work since he is a mason. Antonia would like to build a grocery store. She hopes that business will increase.

Antonia belongs to the group "Colonias Unidas" whose name refers to the fact that members are from various colonies. The group is made up of 11 people who are all hard-working women. They are: Elizabeth, Leocadia, Maria del Carmen, Olivia, Virginia, Delfina, Natalia, Ofelia, Norma, Domitila. All of them perform sales work such as selling sweets, shoes, food, perfume, lingerie, goats, etc.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of sweets and mangos.

loans.name: Las Margaritas Group

texts.es:
Maria cuenta con 65 años de edad, es casada tiene 4 hijos pero solo dos esta estudiando pedro esta estudiando la prepa y deni saldair esta en la secundaria, Hugo Alberto termino la prepa y julia tiene 30 años pero esta enfermita y por eso aun esta con doña Maria porque ella la cuida su esposo se llama Lázaro es campesino.

Ella se dedica al comercio de comida en el mercado del pueblo lleva vendiendo casi toda su vida ella dice que desde que se caso empezó a vender comida saco adelante a sus hijos con ese negocio y es que dice que le va muy bien termina toda su comida le va muy bien e invertirá su préstamo en la compra de los insumos que utiliza para la comida como son: verduras, carne, pollo, etc. Los insumos varean ya que hace varios platillos.

Maria pertenece al grupo las margaritas el cual esta integrado por 12 personas las cuales todas son mujeres trabajadoras a continuación serán mencionadas: adelfa, alba, rosa, Marcela, Obdulia, Victoria, Norberta, Maria del Carmen, Aurora, Agustina, Silveria, todas realizan actividades comerciales como son: abarrotes, comida, pollos, ropa, frutas y verduras, lavandería, perfumes, pescados, pan etc.
texts.en:
Maria is 65 years old. She is married and has four children but only two are studying. Pedro is in high school and Deni Saldair is in secondary school. Hugo Alberto finished high school and Julia is 30 but is a nurse and is still with Maria because she takes care of her husband, Lazaro, who is a peasant.

She is dedicated to selling food in the market of her town. She has been selling for almost all of her life. She says that when she married she began to sell food. She got her children ahead with this business and she says it's going well when she runs out of food and she will invest her loan in the purchase of the ingredients that she uses for her food such as vegetables, meat, chicken etc. The ingredients vary since she makes various dishes.

Maria belongs to the "Margaritas" group which is made up of 12 people who all are hard-working women. They are: Adelfa, Alba, Rosa, Marcela, Obdulia, Victoria, Norberta, Maria del Carmen, Aurora, Agustina, Silveria. All of them perform sales work such as selling groceries, food, chicken, clothing, fruit and vegetables, laundry, perfumes, fish, bread, etc.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of inputs such as vegetables, meat, chicken etc.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.en:
Ricardo is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is widowed with five children. 

Ricardo has a food shop that sells fresh snacks, like fried hotdogs, fried eggs and fried chickens. He also has a sari-sari store that buys and sells snacks and food seasonings. He has had this business for five years. He requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients for making fresh snacks.

Ricardo is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Ricardo hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making fresh snacks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beans for planting.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.en:
Manuela is 58 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. 

Manuela has a shop that buys and sells cassava by the sack. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 4,000 PHP to buy cassava to sell.

Manuela is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Manuela hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy cassava to sell

loans.name: Andres

texts.es:
El señor Andrés  es  un señor trabajador que se dedica a la venta de aguas fresca y a la venta de productos de limpieza desde hace dos años.
Esta felizmente  casado con la señora Higinia una señora trabajadora y humilde.
Tiene  la cantidad de dos hijos por quien trabaja y se esfuerza cada día para  darles lo mejor.
El pidió el préstamo para la compra  ingredientes para la elaboración de aguas como son: frutas naturalrales, agua purificada, azucar, vasos popotes e hielos.
Le da las gracias a fundacion por ayudar a los hombres trabajadores que desean ofrecerle una mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Señor Andrés is a hard-working man who has been selling cold water and cleaning products for the past two years. He is happily married to Señora Higinia who is a hard-working and modest lady. They have two children for whom they work, making the effort everyday to give them the best. He requested the loan to buy ingredients to produce the water such as: natural fruit, purified water, sugar, glasses, straws and ice.
He is grateful to the foundation for helping hard-working men who want to provide their families with a better life.

loans.use: to buy supplies to produce flavored water.

loans.name: Sharoti

texts.en:
Sharoti is married with four children. 
She owns a retail business and has also diversified into renting out houses. 
She  faces the challenge of inadequate capital and her personal goal is to educate her children. 
She hopes to expand her business into new markets as well. Sharoti needs the credit facility to renovate the houses.

loans.use: to renovate houses.

loans.name: Abubakarr

texts.en:
Abubakarr is a secondary school teacher in Makeni, a city in northern Sierra Leone. He is 48 years old, married and the couple have four children. 

His wife is a teacher and his children are attending primary school. Abubakarr has been a teacher for 23 years now. He has requested this loan in order to buy house building materials, like bags of cement, for the construction of a house. 

Abubakarr will repay his Kiva loan, using his monthly salary.

loans.use: to buy house building materials, like bags of cement, for the construction of a house

loans.name: Maria Guadalpe

texts.es:
La señora Maria Guadalupe tiene cuarenta y cuatro años de edad esta felizmente casada con el señor Alfonso un señor trabajador que se dedica a  la albañilería.
Doña Lupe como mejor la conocen sus compañeras de grupo  se dedica a la venta de  a  la venta de antojitos mexicanos como son: tacos dorados empanadas, sopes, enchiladas.
También se dedica a la venta de galletas, sacritas  y dulces ya que es un buen negocio.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de  ingredientes para la elaboración de antojitos como es: maíz para la elaboración de tortillas, chiles verdes, quesos, manteca y jitomate.
Le da las gracias por ayudarla  para que su negocio mejore.
texts.en:
Señora Maria Guadalupe is forty-four years old and she is happily married to Señor Alfonso, a hardworking man who works as a builder.

Doña Lupe, as she is better known among her fellow group members, sells antojitos [typical Mexican snacks] for a living, such as: tacos, empanadas, sopes [fried tortilla topped with refried beans, onion and hot sauce] and enchiladas. She also sells cookies and candy since it is good for business.
She requested the loan to buy ingredients to make antojitos such as: corn to make tortillas, green chilies, cheese, butter and tomatoes.
She is grateful for the support that helps her to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies for food production.

loans.name: Eduardo Ernesto

texts.es: Eduardo Ernesto tiene 33 años de edad, habita junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos dos de los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Eduardo se dedica al negocio de tienda desde hace varios años. Su compañera de vida ayuda con el negocio y entre los dos trabajan duramente para sacar a delante a sus hijos ya que para ellos es  lo más importante en la vida y quieren darles mejores oportunidades de viada a las que ellos han tenido. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos  por lo que es   muy importante mantenerlo activo y seguir persiguiendo los beneficios que hasta el momento ha recibido con satisfacción. Cuenta con algunos clientes fijos los cuales están muy satisfechos con el servicio que él ofrece, además cuenta con muy buenas referencias de sus vecinos,  dado que se caracteriza por ser un hombre honesto, trabajador y sobre todo dedicado a su trabajo. Ha pensado mucho en la forma de mejorar sus ingresos y ha llegado a la conclusión de que la mejor forma es invirtiendo en mercadería para su tiendita ya que de esta forma lograría atraer a más clientes y podría aumentar sus ventas mejorando así sus ingresos. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita es crédito a INTEGRAL  para comprar mercadería de tienda tales como: arroz, azúcar, verduras, bebidas, golosinas, aceite, detergente, y de más productos que permitan atraer a más clientes. De esta forma espera lograr su sueño de dar a su familia una mejora calidad de vida.
texts.en: Eduardo Ernesto, 33, lives with his common-law wife and three children who are in school.  Eduardo runs a store and has been in business for several years.  His wife helps him and they work hard to provide for their children and give them better opportunities in life than what they experienced.  The store is the main source of income so it is very important to keep it active and turning a profit, which so far has been satisfactory.  They have some fixed customers who are very happy with the service offered.  They also have a very good reputation among their neighbors because Eduardo Ernesto is an honest, hard-working man who is dedicated to his job.  He has often thought about how to improve his income and arrived at the conclusion that the best way would be to invest in merchandise for his store.  This will attract more customers and increase sales.  Therefore he is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy goods such as rice, sugar, vegetables, beverages, sweets, oil, detergent and other products that will attract customers.  He hopes he can meet his goal of giving his family the best quality of life possible.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, vegetables, beverages, sweets, oil, detergent, etc.

loans.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es: Luis es socio del Banco Comunal María Celeste, tiene 38 años, es soltero y se dedica a la venta de herramientas paras vehiculos, es socio de Finca Perú desde hace 1 año, Luis esta contento porque ve los resultados en sus ahorros, le favorece los préstamo que hacen por sus bajos intereses, le gusta las capacitaciones porque le ayudan a poder tener un buen negocio, ahora su préstamo lo invertirá en al compra de herramientas.
texts.en: Luis is a member of the communal bank "María Celeste".  He is 38, single and sells tools for vehicles.  For a year now he has been a member of Finca Perú.  He is content to see how his savings add up because of the low-interest loan.  He enjoys the training received because it helps him run a good business.  The loan will be used to buy tools.

loans.use: To buy tools.

loans.name: Delia Reyna

texts.es: Delia Reyna de sesenta y uno años de edad vive con su compañero de vida; ella posee un bazar en su misma casa en el que vende ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, después de atenderlo por mas de 15 años, todo éste tiempo ha ganado la confianza de su cliente y la ha hecho conocida en la localidad, pues vende productos de muy buena calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Delia es una mujer emprendedora con muchos sueños por alcanzar, quiere ver crecer su negocio y no decepcionar a sus clientes, piensa que cada día hay que realizar algo que nos lleve a tener un mejor futuro, es por eso que está decidida a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor como vestidos, faldas, pantalones, camisas entre otros. Delia Reyna tiene la esperanza que así logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Delia Reyna, 61, lives with her common-law husband.  She has a bazaar set up in her house where she sells women's, men's and children's clothing, and has attracted many customers after 15 years of being in business.  She has gained customer trust and become well-known in her town since she sells very good quality products and offers very reasonable prices.  Her customer service is also excellent.

Delia is an enterprising woman with many goals.  She wants to expand her business and not let her customers down.  Her belief is that every day one must do something toward a better future, so she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy wholesale dresses, skirts, trousers and shirts.  Delia Reyna aims to provide the best quality of life possible for her family.

loans.use: To buy dresses, skirts, trousers and shirts.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de artesania,ella vende chompas,polos y chalinas,ella envia a diferentes lugares como Bolivia,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la artesania.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar artesania como polos,chompas y chalinas al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues to sells crafts, sweaters, polo shirts and shawls which she sends to different parts of Bolivia.  Through her business she is providing for her son.  Her dream is to have her own craft shop one day.  She is requesting a loan to buy crafts such as polo shirts, sweaters and shawls wholesale.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy crafts, polo shirts, sweaters and shawls wholesale.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es:
El señor Ernesto  es un señor trabajador sencillo y muy amable  esta felizmente casado con la señora Eva una señora sencilla y trabajadora.
Don Ernesto se dedica a la venta de  antojitos mexicanos como son: tacos de tripa de cecina y de cabeza.
En nos cuenta que  tiene tres años dedicándose a la venta de tacos y  que  le gusta mucho su negocio por que le deja buenas ganancias.
También se dedica a la venta de refrescos y de aguas.
El pidió el préstamo para la compra de ingredientes para la elaboración de tacos como son: tortillas carne, cebolla, Chile verdee tomate verde, rábano y aceite.
Le da las gracias a fundacion por ayudarlo  para que su negocio crezca.
texts.en:
Señor Ernesto is a hard-working, simple and very friendly man. He is happily married to Señora Eva, a simple and hard-working woman. Ernesto sells Mexican dishes, such as tacos with tripes, jerky and heads. He tells us that he has been selling tacos for three years and that he really likes his business because it generates good money. He also sells soft drinks and water.

Ernesto applied for this loan to buy ingredients for his various tacos, which are meat tortillas, onions, green chilies, green tomatoes, radishes and oil. He thanks the microfinance institution FRAC for helping him to grow his business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for his dishes.

loans.name: Jorge Williams

texts.es:
Jorge es un joven de 23 años muy trabajador, el vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad conocida por su clima cálido en cualquier época del año y por sus pobladores , los cuales son personas cariñosas y muy gentiles; Jorge como buen peruano ama nuestra comida, pero el platillo que le gusta más es el “lomo Saltado”. Debido a los bajos recursos económicos de sus padres el solo estudio hasta el quinto año de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar para ser profesor.

Jorge trabaja muy duro como conductor de mototaxi, trabaja alrededor de 10 horas diarias sin parar, puede atender alrededor de 25 clientes diarios, pero cuando hay días festivos puede atender hasta 40 clientes, el cre que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con sus clientes y sobre todo porque es honrado.

Jorge está muy agradecido con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada  el podrá realizar mantenimiento a su mototaxi y reparar algunas averías que tiene  su vehículo, con esta mejora el podrá realizar su trabajo con seguridad no solo para el sino para sus clientes, con ello evitara que le pueda ocurrir algún accidentes debido a inconvenientes mecánicos.
texts.en:
Jorge, 23, is a hard worker and lives in the city of Ica which is known for its mild climate throughout the year and for its local people who are kind and gentle.  Jorge is a good Peruvian and loves the local food, especially "lomo saltado" (sauteed beef tenderloin).  Because of his parents' lack of resources he only was able to get a fifth grade education, but would like to have become a teacher.

Jorge is a motor-taxi driver and works hard ten hours a day with no break time.  He attends to approximately 25 customers a day, and on holidays, as many as 40.  He believes his business is successful because he is very kind to the customers and honest.

Jorge is grateful to Kiva lenders for their support.  He will be able to provide maintenance for his vehicle and make the necessary repairs.  The improvements will give him more safety on the job and for his customers, by avoiding accidents due to mechanical failure.

loans.use: To pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Amparo Maritza

texts.es: Amparo es socia del Banco Comunal Kausachun, tiene 39 años, es madre soltera de 4 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace mas de 4 años, se dedica a la venta de pollo y abarrotes, se siente bien en su banquito y le va bien con las demás socias, gracias a FINCA ha crecido su negocio ya que antes vendía solo pollo y ahora también vende abarrotes, gracias a las capacitaciones aprendió a ahorra, a ser responsable y puntual, lo cual le enseña a sus hijos; el préstamo que solicita lo va invertir en su negocio en compra de mercaderías, y asi poder hacer su casita.
texts.en: Amparo is a member of the Kausachun communal bank. She is 39 years old and a single mother of 4 children. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for more than 4 years. She sells chicken and groceries and feels good at her bank. It is going well for her with the rest of the members. Thanks to FINCA, her business has grown, since before she only sold chicken and now she also sells groceries. Thanks to the trainings, she learned to save, to be responsible and to be punctual. She teaches this to her children. The loans she has asked for will be invested in her business to buy merchandise. IN this way, she will be able to build her little house.

loans.use: to buy rice, pasta and milk for her business.
